tool.name: fitter
tool.description:
\bigskip
{\it Introduction}
A fitter provides a light-weight (eg, no images necessary) for fitting various functions to data.
The tool has no state and thus all the methods are static; there is no open() method because the tool does not "attach" to anything like the image analysis or ms tools do.

method.name: gauss1d
method.shortdescription: Fit any number of one dimensional Gaussians.

param.name: x
param.description: The array of x values. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, integral values from 0 to len(y)-1 are generated.

param.name: mask
param.description: Mask array. Values are masked where this array is False. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, all values are assumed True (no mask)..

method.name: logtranspoly
method.shortdescription: A logarithmic transformed polynomial, ln(y) = c_0 + c_1*ln(x) + c_2*ln(x)**2 + ... + c_n*ln(x)**(n)

param.name: y
param.description: The array of y values, which will be converted to ln(y) before fitting.

param.name: x
param.description: The array of x values. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, integral values from 0 to len(y)-1 are generated.

param.name: mask
param.description: Mask array. Values are masked where this array is False. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, all values are assumed True (no mask)..

method.name: poly
method.shortdescription: A polynomial, c_0 + c_1*x + c_2*x**2 + ... + c_n*x**n

param.name: x
param.description: The array of x values. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, integral values from 0 to len(y)-1 are generated.

param.name: mask
param.description: Mask array. Values are masked where this array is False. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, all values are assumed True (no mask)..

method.name: powerlogpoly
method.shortdescription: A power logarithmic polynomial, c_0*x**(c_1 + c_2*ln(x) + c_3*ln(x)**2 + ... + c_n*ln(x)**(n-1)

param.name: x
param.description: The array of x values. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, integral values from 0 to len(y)-1 are generated.

param.name: mask
param.description: Mask array. Values are masked where this array is False. If specified, must have the same length as y. If not specified, all values are assumed True (no mask)..
